meanings.sent1: She collected rare articles for her museum.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various articles like jewelry and books.
meanings.sent3: The articles in her room seemed to come to life at night.
meanings.sent4: His collection of articles was a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The articles on the shelf sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A piece of writing included in a publication.
meanings.sent1: The magazine published an interesting article about space exploration.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading articles about history in newspapers.
meanings.sent3: The article on penguins made her laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her article was a beacon of knowledge in the sea of information.
meanings.sent5: The article painted a vivid picture of life in the countryside.

meanings.definition: A section of a legal document or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The articles of the contract outlined the responsibilities of each party.
meanings.sent2: Lawyers carefully review the articles in legal documents.
meanings.sent3: The articles in the agreement were written in fine print.
meanings.sent4: The articles of the treaty were crucial for maintaining peace.
meanings.sent5: The articles in the legal paper were binding and clear.
